oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph on Lookout Mountain
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This image was taken atop Lookout Mountain of the leadership of the US Army of the Cumberland. General James H.King-brigade of US regulars; General George Thomas, Commander Army of the Cumberland; General Tower-command of defenses of Nashville; General; Donaldson-chief quartermaster; General Brannan-chief of artillery; Dr. Cooper-Medical Director, Merrill-Chief Engineer; General Whipple-Chief of Staff; Lt. Kelly-Chief Signal Officer; Lt. S.C. Kellogg-aide-de-camp.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tower, Z. B. (Zealous Bates), 1819-1900;Donaldson, James Lowry, 1814-1885;Brannan, John Milton, 1819-1892;Cooper, George E.;Merrill, W. E. (William Emery), 1837-1891;Whipple, William D. (William Denison), 1826-1902;Kelly, Robert;Kellogg, S.C.;King, James H.;Thomas, George H. (George Henry), 1816-1870
